title: What if we had a support item that destroyed or weakened shields?
body:
Imagine a support item that would be a perfect fit for someone like {{champion:432}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:427}} and maybe even {{champion:267}} ?
Aggressive supports who may actively try to make plays and catch out foes with their CC.

I wouldnt know what to call the item, but Itl need stats that are good for catchers and the like. Here are my concept stats

---------------------------------------
10% Cooldown Reduction
10% Movement Speed
80% Base Mana Regen

Unique Passive: Grants either 60 AP _or_ 200 HP depending on whether {{item:3092}} or {{item:3401}} or their lesser parts have been built.

Unique Passive: Cursed Wounds: Hitting an enemy with a _movement-impairing ability_ inflicts _cursed wounds_ for x seconds, causing all shielding and healing to become halved. If a shielded enemy is struck by said movement-impairing ability, The shield will break instantly. Additionally, enemy champions will take bonus damage from all sources from and during your crowd-control effects.

-------------------------
Thoughts? I would love to see an item thats made for catchers, instead of reactive/protective supports like {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}}{{champion:16}}

replies.body: this would be better on a dmg dealer like a mage/adc/ assassin, you cant just have it destroy,  an grevious wounds already halves healing, so if any thing have grevious wounds lower shield gains.
